features: 【18/8 PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL】Stainless Steel Workout Water Bottle is made from premium high grade 18/8 grade stainless steel, which is 100% BPA free and non-toxic, never leave a metal taste, durable and long-lasting. The outside layer is anti-slip for easy grip. More durable than any other usual bottle and suitable for all kinds of outdoor activities.

【STRAW LID & STRAW BRUSH】The steel metal water bottle is equipped with straw lid easy to drink and comes with straw brush easy to clean it.the straw lid also built with carry strap,easy to take it anywhere you want.

【LEAKPROOF】The Sweat-proof travel water bottle is equipped with BPA-free silicone rubber on lid, creating a leakproof seal. Perfect for hiking, biking, boating, the gym, work, school, and home. The bottle is safe in backpacks, beach bags, or the edge of your countertop. Please note: They are not dishwasher safe.

【 DOUBLE WALLED】Double-walled and vacuum-sealed to make sure you experience zero condensation, keep beverages cold for 24 hours, and hot for up to 12 hours, making it the perfect sports or commuting bottle. The sweat-proof design keeps your fingers dry.

【INSULATED WATER BOTTLE FEATURE&GURANTEE】20oz steel water bottle ​with various colors. Comes with 1 straw lid,1package box, 1 straw brush. If you’re not satisfied with GOPPUS water bottle, just let us know, and we'll make it right with a prompt refund or replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great sturdy good capacity metal insulated bike bottle
reviews.reviewText: great insulation hot or cold liquids sturdy metal bottle with choice of 3 different lid closures and light weight to carry in bike rear or front pannier bags or fitted to bike frame! Highly recommend above and beyond quality appearance and usefulness at great price point!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, love, love this water bottle!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best water bottle I have ever had. It’s beautiful on the outside, insulated stainless steel on the inside. The ice stays solid and water stays cold all day long. It comes with three different lids. The first one has an attached straw so you don’t have to tip the bottle over to sip. It also has a hanging strap for easy carrying. The second lid is the kind you sip from the bottle and comes with a fruit filter if you want to put fruit in your water. The filter prevents the fruits from coming through the sip hole. It has an optional carrying handle on the top that flips up if you want to use it. Very convenient! The third lid is a solid screw on cap for when you are using it for hot liquids. You can also use it for cold liquids. It has a handle that you can strap onto your belt buckle or pant strap or even a bicycle. It also comes with a long straw brush. I can’t say enough about this bottle. It is very durable and easy to clean. Oh, and did I mention that there is no condensation on the outside of the bottle when you are using it with cold liquids. That is what I absolutely hated about all my other bottles was the condensation dripping down and the water ruining my table surface. This bottle does not do that! They also have excellent customer service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product - great customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Terrific product and customer service to match. After 2 years of hard use in my son's school backpack, one of the lids broke. Goppus quickly sent a replacement free of charge. Couldn't be more satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the size and sleekness of the water bottle. Keeps me drinks cold for a long time (have not tried the hot). My only complaint is wishing all the lids had a band strap. Only one of them does and so it makes it difficult to use the other lid attachments. I bought it excited to switch them out, but I want the strap all the time so I am stuck with using just one type of lid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stays cold and holds ice
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 6yo for school.It’s slim enough to fit nicely in her cup holder on the side of her bookbag and it keeps her water nice and cold all day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this water bottle for my child to take to school. It is a good size. They do have a bigger size but I think it would be to big, but this one is a decent size to take to school. Stays cold all day. I haven’t had problems with it leaking like others I’ve bought before. Comes 3 different lids to put on water bottle as shown in pic. Comes with everything in pic. Came with free stickers the ones in pic. There a is rainbow sticker too which we put on bottle already but **Does Not come with the bunny stickers on the bottle**I ordered separately. The stickers it came with are cute as well but my kid wanted some bunny stickers on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two hacks needed
reviews.reviewText: First, don't know why this is called a kids' water bottle. The 17 oz capacity is perfect for me and I'm a grownup. The build is solid. It required two hacks. First the steel bottle gets hot when exposed to the sun or in the steamroom (!), too hot to comfortably handle. I put a small neoprene beer can wrap on it and problem solved. The other hack was needed when it was hard to suck water. I trimmed about 1/4 inch off the end of the straw and it solved the problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 star customer service
reviews.reviewText: I bought this water bottle via recommendation from Mamavation (if you have never heard of her and care about lowering your toxiv exposure, I highly recommend you check her out). I have been using this water bottle less than a month. The outside edge is already rusting....this makes me wonder what it is actually made of. I wouldn't suspect stainless steel to rust so rapidly.I really liked the multiple lid options. I really like the capacity. I really like the color. I really like it fits in regular cup holders. But I don't know if it will last long. I can technically still return it, so I think I will attempt an exchange.Update 1: I did exchange and my second one did the same thing, but due to vacations I missed the return window.I bought 5 of the 20 oz bottles for my kids at the same time I purchased my 1st 30 oz and NONE of those have rusted at all. Same type of use. Same type of water. I am going to see if I can contact the manufacturer.Update 2: I contacted the manufacturer and they got Amazon to issue a refund AND the sent me a new water bottle. So customer service is 5 start quality! They sent me a different color and I'm hoping this time I don't see any rust. My kid's 20 oz are still going strong so I know that the majority of their bottles are good quality usually.
It was bigger then expected but stays cold

Ordered the 50 oz bottle that was supposed to come with 2 lids (one soft rubber spout, one plastic), a bottle brush and a straw brush. I only wanted the plastic lid, as the rubber tends to get gross after a while. Sizing is great, I drink 2 of these a day, and it keeps the water cold all day, but not happy that I only received the one lid with the rubber.

We got this as a birthday gift for my 5 year old daughter and didn’t expect a ton out of it, but it is fantastic. The 3 different lids are really handy to have, they’re all leakproof when installed correctly, they’re great for different uses. It’s great that when I need to wash a lid I can switch it out so she can keep using it. Seems to hold temperature pretty well, is quite durable so far, colour hasn’t chipped off with a couple drops over the past few days. Very impressed

I like it - been about 2/3 months since I got it. Keeps whatever liquid I put in at the temperature it should be for a decent amount of time. This one is the 50/60 OZ & it’s pretty tall. don’t think it can fit in any regular sized cup holder as the base is pretty wide.
